creator: Canada. Department of Militia and Defence (author)
Bergin, Darby, 1826-1896. (author)
Roddick, Thomas George (Sir), 1846-1923. (author)
description: Bergin, Darby: 1826-1896. Surgeon-General, Canadian militia, 1885. // Roddick, Thomas George (Sir): 1846-1923. Born Harbour Grace, Newfoundland; on faculty of medicine at McGill, 1875-1908; entered Canadian militia, 1868; saw service in Fenian raid, 1870; deputy surgeon-general in North West expeditionary force, 1885; in House of Commons, 1896-1904; created knight bachelor, 1914 (Wallace, Dictionary of Canadian biography). // Signed: "D. Bergin, Surgeon-General, Canadian Militia." Other title: "Report of the Surgeon General." Largely the daily journal and final report of Roddick.
